cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 26th Dec 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 26th Dec 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

dorms.name: Basic 10 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: A spacious room consisting of 5 bunk beds, small lockers for valuables (padlocks available for purchase at reception) and shared bathroom facilities located on the same floor.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

dorms.name: Standard 8 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: A spacious room consisting of 4 bunk beds, small lockers for valuables (padlocks available for purchase at reception) and an en-suite shower and toilet.

dorms.name: Standard 4 Bed Female Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: A spacious female only room consisting of 2 bunk beds, small lockers for valuables (padlocks available for purchase at reception) and an en-suite shower and toilet.

privates.name: Deluxe Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Private room with King size bed, ensuite bathroom, Freeview TV, fridge, Tea/Coffee facilities, heating & aircon. This has a shared balcony with the private room located next door to enjoy scenic views the of The Queenstown Remarkables
